verses.verse: The men<WH582> of Kiriath Jearim<WH7157> came,<WH935> and fetched up<WH5927> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and brought<WH935> it into the house<WH1004> of Abinadab<WH41> in the hill,<WH1389> and sanctified<WH6942> Eleazar<WH499> his son<WH1121> to keep<WH8104> the ark<WH727> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

Samuel<WH8050> took<WH3947> a<WH259> suckling<WH2461> lamb,<WH2924> and offered<WH5927> it for a whole<WH3632> burnt offering<WH5930> to Yahweh:<WH3068> and Samuel<WH8050> cried<WH2199> to Yahweh<WH3068> for Israel;<WH3478> and Yahweh<WH3068> answered him.<WH6030>

The men<WH582> of Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> of Mizpah,<WH4709> and pursued<WH7291> the Philistines,<WH6430> and struck<WH5221> them,<WH1033> until they came under Beth Kar.

He went<WH1980> from<WH1767> year<WH8141> to year<WH8141> in circuit<WH5437> to Bethel<WH1008> and Gilgal,<WH1537> and Mizpah;<WH4709> and he judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> in all those places.<WH4725>
